verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H7725>call<s%> them <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3824>mind<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5080>driven<s%> thee,

And shalt <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and shalt <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

That then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon thee, and will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> thee from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6327>scattered<s%> thee.

If <S%H518><s%> any of thine <S%H1961>be<s%> driven <S%H5080>out<s%> unto the <S%H7097>outermost<s%> parts of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> thee, and from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> will he <S%H3947>fetch<s%> thee:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3423>possessed,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; and he will do thee <S%H3190>good,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee above thy <S%H4480>fathers.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H2416>live.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> thee.

And <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will make thee <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land,<s%> for <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thy fathers: <S%H1><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6381>hidden<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> is <S%H1931>it<s%> far <S%H7350>off.<s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it unto us, that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it?

Neither <S%H3808><s%> is <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for us, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it unto us, that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it?
But <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, in thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and in thy <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H6213>do<s%> it.
See, <S%H7200><s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H7451>evil;<s%>

In <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

But <S%H518>if<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> turn <S%H6437>away,<s%> so that thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> but shalt be drawn <S%H5080>away,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them;

I <S%H5046>denounce<s%> unto you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye shall surely <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H6><s%> and that ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> passest <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to record this <S%H3117>day<s%> against you, that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H7045>cursing:<s%> therefore <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> both <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> may live: <S%H2421><s%>

That thou mayest <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and that thou mayest <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and that thou mayest <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is thy <S%H2416>life,<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days:<s%> that thou mayest <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.
